snippet.title: WaveTiles - The Gameplay Experience (Kickstarter Video)
snippet.description:
Kickstarter campaign is now live! You can support our game by pre-purchasing it along with exclusive items!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/whocaresgames/wavetiles



You can add the game to your Steam Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1576540

Follow us to stay updated!!
https://www.facebook.com/WhoCaresGames
https://www.instagram.com/WhoCaresGames
